response.summary: Chemical Engineer graduated from Universidad Nacional de Colombia and student of the Master's Degree in Product and Process Design at Universidad de los Andes. I am currently working as a leader of innovation projects for the development of new ingredients with applications in food and personal care . I have the ability to work in interdisciplinary teams, with analytical and problem solving skills, results orientation, leadership and creativity. I am a passionate person, adaptable to change and with great interest in continuous learning and new challenges.

profile_positions.description: Leading innovation projects for new product development in food and personal care industries.
profile_positions.title: New Product Development leader

profile_positions.description:
- Improvement of palm oil refining processes and optimization of biodiesel production, reducing operating costs and increasing product quality. 
- Chemical transformation of oils and fats to obtain new products: fuels, lubricant bases and agricultural adjuvants.
profile_positions.title: Junior Researcher

profile_positions.description:
Process and equipment design and specification for oil&gas projects at different engineering stages (conceptual, basic and detailed) 
- Steam network design for the new ASSIUT hydrocracking complex located in Egypt. Material and energy balances, simulation, control loops, P&IDs designd and instrumentation specification sheets. Joint work with Technip Italy engineers.
profile_positions.title: Process Specialist

profile_positions.description: Mechanical specification of rotating equipment and chemical dosing packages for oil & gas projects. - Technical alignment with suppliers during the quotation and equipment purchase stages of the Talara (Peru) refinery modernization project.
profile_positions.title: Machinery & package units-Specialist I

profile_positions.description: Process and equipment design. Project leader for the design and construction of an evaporator train for a pilot plant.
profile_positions.title: Support Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Research and development internship with emphasis on syngas production from partial methane oxidation using oxygen transporting membranes (OTM).
 Responsibilities:
-Thermodynamic analysis, design and simulation of a syngas production process employing oxygen transport membranes (Oxygen Transport Membranes OTM). 
-Technical support in other projects, e.g., pre-feasibility study of helium isotope separation process.
profile_positions.title: R&D Intern

company.name: Zeolites synthesis from residual ashes of thermoelectric processes

profile_positions.company: Zeolites synthesis from residual ashes of thermoelectric processes
profile_positions.description: Speaker of the researcher project entitled "Zeolite synthesis from residual ashes of the thermoelectric processes" at the conference "XXV Encuentro Nacional de Estudiantes de Ingeniería Química (ENEIQ) 2015"
profile_positions.title: Conference Speaker

company.name: Bio D S.A.
company.description:
It is with immense pleasure that we welcome you to Bio D.

Over 10 years ago, we were created by 13 visionary Colombian companies who have dedicated themselves to transforming how people view and benefit from truly sustainable palm oil.

Today, with 17 committed stakeholders and full ownership of our supply chain, we are producing some of the highest quality and most responsible bio-renewable solutions in the world.

By living our Symbiotic Circle of Business each and every day, we are able to show you who we are and what we believe. Our Symbiotic Circle of Business has also been the reason why our clients have enjoyed our dependability for so long.

As we continue to grow, all of us at Bio D are encouraged to know that because of who we are and what we value, our future looks bright. The only way we will sustain our success as a global organization, is by continuing to be a responsible Colombian company.

location.address: Terminal de Combustibles Sabana Mancila Facatativá-El Vino, Facatativá, Cundinamarca
